name: The Ancient Mariner
description: In Vintage Spirits and Forgotten Cocktails, Ted Haigh shares this variation on Trader Vic's original Navy Grog.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce dark Jamaican rum, such as Coruba

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a double old fashioned glass with crushed ice, then add both rums, lime, grapefruit juice, simple syrup, and allspice dram. Stir gently, then garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig.
